item.title: Matching Up With Defensive Characteristics
item.description: I have a fairly low tolerance for good defenders getting beat. On the other hand, I’m always telling my girls (until I’m blue in the face) that the offensive player always has an advantage because she always know where she’s going to cut, and the defensive player is always a step behind. That being said, I’m always going to put my best defender on the other team’s best offensive threat, unless there’s a reason that I don’t want that matchupâ€”be it height, or speed, or whatever.
